item.description:
I love this place's brunch menu (which is only offer on wknd and completely different from the normal fare, http://www.beyondmenu.com/21302/Boston/Jo-Jo-Taipei-Allston-02134.aspx?r=21302#group_97028)...remind me of a simple, delicious breakfast in Beijing or HongKong

JoJo agreed to setup two table that will seat 10 ppl each, one table will definitely be eating family style (entrees sharing)...The other table is for ppl with dietary retrictions or prefer to order your own entrees if those stituations arises

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Jo Jo Taipei Wknd Brunch
